title: NFL Mock Draft Monday: Biggest stories of draft season, A Trade for Tua (Football 2/10)
description:
Will Brinson is joined CBS Sports NFL Draft experts Ryan Wilson and R.J. White for the 1st 'Mock Draft Monday' of 2020. The guys analyze the biggest storylines that we'll discuss over the next few months including Tua Tagovailoa's health, a star-studded wide receiver class, quarterback depth and Joe Burrow's willingness to play for the Bengals.

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod @WillBrinson, @RyanWilson, @rjwhite1
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/
For more NFL coverage from CBS Sports, visit https://www.cbssports.com/nfl/
To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy

The guys analyze the biggest storylines that we'll discuss over the next few months including Tua Tagovailoa's health, a star-studded wide receiver class, quarterback depth and Joe Burrow's willingness to play for the Bengals.
